Docs.summary: Gets or sets the queue category.
Docs.value: The queue category (Message Queuing type identifier), which allows an application to categorize its queues.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission CreatePermission() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates the permission based on the requested access levels, category, label, computer name, and path that are set through the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionAttribute.PermissionAccess%2A>, <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionAttribute.Category%2A>, <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionAttribute.Label%2A>, <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionAttribute.MachineName%2A>, and <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionAttribute.Path%2A> properties on the attribute.
Docs.returns: A that represents the created permission.
